title: Minimum Wages and Conditions of Employment (Truck and Bus Drivers) (Amendment) Order, 2021
content:
31st December, 2021 Statutory Instruments 741
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 93 of 2021
The Employment Code Act
(Act No. 3 of 2019)
The Minimum Wages and Conditions of Employment
(Truck and Bus Drivers) (Amendment) Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 106 of the
Employment Code Act, 2019, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Minimum Wages and Title
Conditions of Employment (Truck and Bus Drivers) (Amendment)
Order, 2021, and shall be read as one with the Minimum Wages SI. No. 106
and Conditions of Employment (Truck and Bus Drivers) Order, of 2020
2020, in this Order referred to as the principal Order.
2. The principal Order is amended by the revocation of Revocation
paragraph 11 and the substitution therefor of the following: and

Subsistence allowance for local trip
(b) in the case of a truck driver, the truck does not

(2) Despite sub-paragraph (1), an employer shall, where
the truck has a sleeping cabin, pay a truck driver who spends
a night away from home to attend to any business of the
employer a subsistence allowance of one hundred kwacha
per night.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
